metadata.title: CVE-2022-0344 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from10.0 before 14.5.4, all versions starting from 10.1 before 14.6.4, allversions starting from 10.2 before 14.7.1. Private project paths can bedisclosed to unauthorized users via system notes when an Issue is closedvia a Merge Request and later moved to a public project

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
